hints.label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
hints.title: Drift Condition with Quadratic Lyapunov
hints.content:
2088: :label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
2089: 
2090: Under Assumptions A1 (confinement) and A3 (friction), there exist constants $a, b, c > 0$ such that the quadratic Lyapunov function:
2091: 
2092: $$
2093: V(x,v) = a|x|^2 + 2b x \cdot v + c|v|^2
2094: $$
2095: 
2096: satisfies a drift condition with respect to the **adjoint operator** $\mathcal{L}^*$:
2097: 
2098: $$
2099: \mathcal{L}^*[V] \le -\beta V + C
2100: $$
hints.raw_directive:
2085: Moreover, the simple Lyapunov $V = |x|^2 + |v|^2$ does NOT satisfy a drift condition due to the cross-term $x \cdot v$. We need a **quadratic form** that handles this coupling.
2086: 
2087: :::{prf:lemma} Drift Condition with Quadratic Lyapunov
2088: :label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
2089: 
2090: Under Assumptions A1 (confinement) and A3 (friction), there exist constants $a, b, c > 0$ such that the quadratic Lyapunov function:
2091: 
2092: $$
2093: V(x,v) = a|x|^2 + 2b x \cdot v + c|v|^2
2094: $$
2095: 
2096: satisfies a drift condition with respect to the **adjoint operator** $\mathcal{L}^*$:
2097: 
2098: $$
2099: \mathcal{L}^*[V] \le -\beta V + C
2100: $$

hints.title: Exponential Tails for QSD
hints.content:
2250: :label: thm-exponential-tails
2251: 
2252: Under Assumptions A1-A4, the QSD $\rho_\infty$ satisfies:
2253: 
2254: $$
2255: \rho_\infty(x,v) \le C e^{-\alpha(|x|^2 + |v|^2)}
2256: $$
2257: 
2258: for some constants $\alpha, C > 0$ depending on $\gamma$, $\sigma^2$, $\kappa_{\text{conf}}$, and $\kappa_{\max}$.
